text.tspan: App
Instantiate WorldManager (user defined) and inject it to the Environment of the SwuitUI.
Instantiate ContentView (SwiftUI) in var body.
ContentView
Instantiate MetalView (Custom SwuitUI View)in var body.
The user interaction between the SwuftUI components and the WorldManager is handled throught the Environment.
MetalView
Adapter to UIKit's MTKView.
Adopts UIViewRepresentable protocol to interface between SwitfUI and UIKit's UIView.
Instantiate ARCoordinator (user defined) and communicates with it.
Optionally instantiate GestureHandler (user defined) and communicates with it.
TouchMTKView
Subclass of MTKView.
Overrides 3 functions: touchesBegan(), touchesMoved(), and touchesEnded().
Passes the touches on to the delegate (WorldManager).
Instantiate TouchMTKView and its delegate (MetalView.Coordinator).
Invokes ARCoordinator on the frame size change and the draw() call.
ARCoordinator
Instantiates and manages ARSession and its ARAnchors.
Draws the photo images captured by the camera in the background.
Arranges the geometry info (model, view, projection matrices) of the ARCamera for WorldManager for rendering with Metal.
Arranges the geometry info (model matrix) for the ARAnchors for WorldManager.
Invokes WorldManager on the frame size change and the draw() call.
WorldManager
Renders objects with Metal upon reciving draw() call from the ARCoordinator.
Interacts with SwiftUI through the SwiftUI's environment and@Published variables.
Receives touch info from the MTKView.
MTKView
PhotoImageRenderer
Instantiates and manages PhotoImageRenderer.
